long_description: The stem-mountable PDA Phone Pack from Topeak keeps PDA, large cell phone or other electronic device close at hand. Integrated sleeve on the side provides a place to put your sunglasses or a pen. Quick-clip mount ensures fast, easy attachment and removal from stem or handlebar. Neoprene construction is weather resistant and helps protects against shock.
short_description: The stem-mountable PDA Phone Pack from Topeak keeps PDA, large cell phone or other electronic device close at hand.
